channel.title: others on wrfly's blog
channel.description: Recent content in others on wrfly's blog

item.title: stardict's icon
item.description: Boys and girls~ 由于stardict的图标是png格式的，放大之后那个锯齿哟……所以我就自己画了一个～ 把它放到/usr/share/app-install/icons/stardict.svg 然后修改/usr/share/applications/stardict.desktop的Icon=/usr/share/app-install/icons/stardict.svg.
